channel.title: How can i show my maxhit on an Object? HELP
channel.description: hey guy's i added ::maxhit but i was thinking how can i make it so u like spec or hit an object and it tells u ur max hit? like for example dummy's ? how do i make it so it tells me my max hit when i hit them?
